Invocation for a family who invites you.ARABIC_TEXT: ((أَفْطَرَ عِنْدَكُمُ الصَّائِمُونَ، وَأَكَلَ طَعَامَكُمُ الْأَبْرَارُ، وَصَلَّتْ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَلاَئِكَةُ)).
Invocation for a family who invites you.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (May the fasting break their fast in your home, and may the dutiful and pious eat your food, and may the angles send prayers upon you.)
